name: SMART_ACTION_NONE
help: Does nothing

name: SMART_ACTION_TALK_DEPRECATED

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Group id from table creature_text. Random text will be said if multiple rows with the same group

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.description: Duration to wait before TEXT_OVER event is triggered

help: This is old action to talk, it can stay in old scripts, but do not use for new scripts

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION

parameters.name: Faction Id
parameters.description: Use 0 to reset

parameters.name: Use target's faction
parameters.description: If true, Faction Id parameter will be ignored and source will get target's faction.

help: Sets unit faction. If Target is selected (not None), source will take target's faction

name: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL

parameters.name: Creature
parameters.description: Use 0 for both to reset

parameters.name: Model id
parameters.description: Use 0 for both to reset

description: {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2value:choose(0):Demorph|Morph to model {pram2}}|{pram2value:choose(0):Morph to model from creature {pram1}|Invalid morph ({pram1}, {pram2}}}
help: Morphs unit to entry or model depending on parameters

name: SMART_ACTION_SOUND

parameters.name: Only to self
parameters.description: True - only source will hear the sound, false - everyone in visibility range will hear the sound

description: Play sound {pram1} to {pram2value:choose(0):every player in visibility range of {source}|{source}}
help: Plays sound from SoundEntries.dbc

name: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE

parameters.name: Emote ID
parameters.description: Emote id to play

help: Unit plays an emote

name: SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Quest ID to mark as failed. Only for players

help: Quest in players log is marked as failed

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_QUEST

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Add quest, only for players

parameters.name: Discover quest
parameters.description: If true, player will see "discovered" dialog on the right

parameters.name: Kill credit
parameters.description: If non-zero will get player also kill credit

description: Add quest {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| as "discovered"}{pram3value:choose(0):| and give kill credit {pram3}}
help: Adds a quest for a player

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_REACT_STATE
help: Sets the npc reaction state - passive, defensive or aggresive.

name: SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT
help: Activates selected gameobject // SetLootState(GO_READY); UseDoorOrButton(0, false, [invoker]);

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE

parameters.name: Emote 1
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 2
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 3
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 4
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 5
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 6
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

help: Unit plays random emote from list

name: SMART_ACTION_CAST

parameters.name: Spell
parameters.description: Spell id to cast

parameters.name: Cast Flags
parameters.description: SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE only works when caster is current script creature

parameters.name: Trigger flags
parameters.description: If non 0, those trigger flags will be used during cast. Trigger smart cast flag is using all those flags

help: Source casts spell on target

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE

parameters.name: Creature
parameters.description: Creature Entry to summon

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: In ms

parameters.name: Storage ID
parameters.description: Target variable id to store summoned creature

help: The source summons a creature

name: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT

parameters.name: Increment
parameters.description: Modify threat of target by %

parameters.name: Decrement
parameters.description: Modify threat of target by %

help: Every target's threat on source threat list is modified by percentage

name: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT

parameters.name: Increment
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

parameters.name: Decrement
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

description: {pram1value:choose(0):Decrement|Increment} threat of all units in threat list by {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2}|{pram1}}
help: All threat on source threat list is modified by percentage

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Trigger quest group event. Also complete the quest

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE
help: Sets npc emote state (UNIT_FIELD_EMOTESTATE)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG
help: Adds unit flag

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG
help: Removes unit flag

name: SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK

parameters.name: Allow Attack State
parameters.description: false = stop attack, true = attack

help: Toggle auto attack [DEPRECATED?]

name: SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT

parameters.name: Allow Combat Movement
parameters.description: false = stop combat based movement, true = enable combat movement

help: Toggles combat movement: if turned on, creature will chase victim, if off, creature will stop chasing current target and any other in the future

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: Note: This is Smart AI event phase, not actual creature phasemask

help: Changes script phase, you can choose if event can fire in specific phase

name: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE
description: Increment phase by {pram1} and decrement by {pram2}
help: Increments script phase, you can choose if event can fire in specific phase

name: SMART_ACTION_EVADE
help: NPC enters evade mode (stops attacking, return home)

name: SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST

parameters.name: With Emote
parameters.description: If set, creature will flee for assist with emote

help: NPC searches for nearest friend and goes there to get assistance during the attack (only in combat)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS
description: Call event happened from quest {pram1} for the whole group with GUID {target}
help: player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(questId)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_CASTEDCREATUREORGO
help: player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(questId)

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL

parameters.name: Spell
parameters.description: Spell id to remove aura, if 0, all auras will be removed

description: {pram1value:choose(0):Remove all auras|Remove aura due to spell {pram1}}
help: Removes all auras by spell ID

name: SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: 0 = default

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: 0 = default

parameters.name: EndCreatureEntry
parameters.description: THIS ONLY WORKS WITH SAI v1

parameters.name: Credit
parameters.description: THIS ONLY WORKS WITH SAI v1

parameters.name: Credit Type
parameters.description: THIS ONLY WORKS WITH SAI v1

0.name: Monster kill
0.description: Kill credit from parameter `credit` will be counted up

1.name: Event
1.description: has to be checked what it is

help: Makes source follow target

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE
help: Sets script phase to random one

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE

parameters.name: Phase Min
parameters.description: Minimum phase to random between (SAI phase)

parameters.name: Phase Max
parameters.description: Maximum phase to random between (SAI phase)

description: Set random event phase between range {pram1} and {pram2}
help: Sets script phase to any in range

name: SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT
help: If gameobject loot state is GO_NOT_READY or GO_ACTIVATED, it sets state to GO_JUST_DEACTIVATED, removes flag GO_FLAG_IN_USE and switches object state to GO_STATE_ACTIVE/GO_STATE_READY (depending on previous state)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER
help: Gives a player quest kill credit

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA
help: Calls SetData(field, data) on source's instance script

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA_GUID
help: Calls SetGuidData(field, target's guid) on source's instance scrit

name: SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE

parameters.name: Team
parameters.description: (for faction data)

description: Update template as if it was creature {pram1} with team {pram2}
help: Changes NPC template entry to another

name: SMART_ACTION_DIE
help: Source dies (kills self)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE
description: Set in combat with current zone
help: Adds threat to all players in current map (only on dungeons and raids!)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP
help: Creatures in range will attack current target (only in combat)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH
help: Sets sheath (byte 0 of UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2)

name: SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN
help: Creature/gameobject despawns. Calls DespawnOrUnsummon() on creatures and ForcedDespawn on gameobjects

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_INVINCIBILITY_HP_LEVEL

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: If non 0, only players with this quest in state incomplete will modify damage done

parameters.name: Only call event
parameters.description: If true, when reaches HP invinc level, event will be called but HP WILL NOT STOP at given level

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: If you have multiple HP invinceability levels over time (but only 1 at the same time!), you can give them ID so that only those will be triggered in event

description: {pram1value:choose(0):Disable HP invinceability|{pram5value:choose(0):Set minimum HP to {pram1value}{pram2value:choose(0):|%}|Call HP invinceability reached event when below {pram1value}{pram2value:choose(0):|%} HP} (damage done by {pram3value:choose(0):player|{pram3}}){pram4value:choose(0):| (only if attacker has quest {pram4} incomplete)}}{pram6value:choose(0):| (ID: {pram6})}
help: Sets minimum health script npc can reach. When reached EVENT_INVINCEABILITY_HP_REACHED is called.

name: SMART_ACTION_MOUNT_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL
help: Mounts or dismounts

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_INGAME_PHASE_MASK
help: Sets object phase mask

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA

parameters.name: Is special data
parameters.description: If true, the value will be set to variable @data of @source or @target

help: Sends data (EVENT_SET_DATA) to source. When target is specified, special version with invoker will be called (be careful when combining SAI with c++)

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD
help: Unit moves forward. Later EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM with point type POINT_MOTION_TYPE will be invoked

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_VISIBILITY
help: Sets npc visibility (GM will see them anyway)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ACTIVE
help: Object is marked as active - it is updated even if there is no player nearby. Be careful and use only when required as a lot of active npc can create diff.

name: SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_START
help: Creature attacks target (if possible)

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO

parameters.name: Despawn Time
parameters.description: In ms

description: Summon gameobject {pram1} at {target_position} and despawn in {pram2} seconds
help: Summons gameobject at specific position

name: SMART_ACTION_KILL_UNIT
help: Unit kills targets

name: SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_TAXI
help: Player takes taxi flight (id from TaxiPath.dbc)

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_START

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest to complete when path ends (escort quest)

parameters.name: Despawn time
parameters.description: Despawn time after finishing the path

help: [DEPRECATED! DO NOT USE] Script creature starts path from `waypoints` table. You should use ACTION_WP_START_PATH (214) instead

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_PAUSE

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Miliseconds to wait before resuming path

help: [DEPRECATED! DO NOT USE] Pauses waypoints started by action ACTION_WP_START

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP

parameters.name: Despawn Time
parameters.description: Time to wait before despawn

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest id to mark as complete or failed

parameters.name: Fail/Complete
parameters.description: Quest will be marked as either completed or failed

description: Stop path{pram1value:choose(0):, despawn instantly|, despawn in {pram1} ms}{pram2value:choose(0):|{pram3value:choose(0):, complete|, fail} quest {pram2}}
help: [DEPRECATED! DO NOT USE] Stops waypoints started by action ACTION_WP_START

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_ITEM
help: Adds item to player backpack

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ITEM
help: Removes item from player backpack

name: SMART_ACTION_INSTALL_AI_TEMPLATE
help: Script creature adds events and actions predefined in core.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN
help: NPC runs instead of walking

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_FLY

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: If true, flight will be enabled

help: Toggles gravity (::SetDisableGravity) for NPC. You might also want to change creature UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1 for flying animation

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_SWIM

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: If true, swimming will be enabled

help: Toggles MOVEMENT_FLAG_SWIMMING

name: SMART_ACTION_TELEPORT
help: Teleports unit to given position (either relative or absolute coords, depending on target type: Position - absolute, otherwise - relative)

parameters.name: Map
parameters.description: If you want to use this parameter, set "Same map" to false

parameters.name: Same map
parameters.description: You can teleport to other map only players

name: SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST

parameters.name: Limit targets amount
parameters.description: If non 0, no more than given amount of objects will be stored (first on the list)

parameters.name: Shuffle targets
parameters.description: If true, it will randomly shuffle targets before storing (and before limiting amount of targets)

description: {pram2value:choose(0):{pram3value:choose(0):{stored} = {target}|{stored} = {target} (shuffle targets first)}|{pram3value:choose(0):{stored} = {target} (first {pram2} targets)|{stored} = {target} (shuffle and take first {pram2} targets)}}
help: Store targets. If there are any other stored targets at given ID, they will be overridden

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_RESUME
help: [DEPRECATED! DO NOT USE] Resumes waypoints started by action ACTION_WP_START

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION
help: Set object facing

name: SMART_ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT

parameters.name: Timed event id
parameters.description: This timed event will be triggered. must be greater or equal than 1

parameters.name: Initial Min
parameters.description: In miliseconds

parameters.name: Initial Max
parameters.description: In miliseconds

parameters.name: Repeat Min
parameters.description: (only if it repeats)

parameters.name: Repeat Max
parameters.description: (only if it repeats)

description: Trigger timed event {timed1} in {pram2} - {pram3} secs{pram4value:choose(0):| and then trigger every {pram4} - {pram5} secs}{pram6value:choose(0):| with {pram6} chance}
help: After specified time, event EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED will be triggered.

description_rules.description: Trigger timed event {timed1} in {pram2} secs{pram4value:choose(0):| and then trigger every {pram4} - {pram5} secs}{pram6value:choose(0):| with {pram6} chance}

name: SMART_ACTION_PLAYMOVIE
help: Plays movie from

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS

parameters.name: Transport
parameters.description: If true, offset position required. Only with TARGET_POSITION

description: Move to {target_position} (point id {pram1}){pram3value:choose(0):| {pram3}}{pram5value:choose(0):| move in {pram5} secs}
help: Moves to position. Once reached EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM with point type POINT_MOTION_TYPE will be invoked

name: SMART_ACTION_RESPAWN_TARGET
help: Source will respawn

name: SMART_ACTION_EQUIP

parameters.name: Eqipment ID
parameters.description: Entry from table creature_equip_template

parameters.name: Slotmask
parameters.description: If 0 (or 7) all items will be equiped, 1, 2, 4 are bits for next three items (you can add them)

parameters.name: Slot 1
parameters.description: Only if equipement id is 0

parameters.name: Slot 2
parameters.description: Only if equipement id is 0

parameters.name: Slot 3
parameters.description: Only if equipement id is 0

help: Creature equips item

name: SMART_ACTION_CLOSE_GOSSIP
help: Closes gossip

name: SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Must be greater or equal than 1

help: Force call EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_TIMED_EVENT

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Must be greater or equal than 1

help: Cancel timed event created by ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA
help: [BE CAREFUL] Source adds aura to target (if target is NONE, source will add aura on self). Please note: this action shouldn't be used, you should use CastSpell, if it doesn't, you should debug it :)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_SCRIPT_RESET
help: Calls EVENT_RESET on source AI

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_RANGED_MOVEMENT

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: In degrees

help: [DEPRECATED] Target will start chasing its victim (only works with SAI targets LOL)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_TIMED_ACTIONLIST

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: overwrites already running actionlist?

help: Source will start script from smart_scripts with script_source_type == 9 (will override existing action list!)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_NPC_FLAG
help: Sets NPC flags (UNIT_NPC_FLAGS field)

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_NPC_FLAG
help: Adds NPC flag (UNIT_NPC_FLAGS field)

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_NPC_FLAG
help: Removes NPC flag (UNIT_NPC_FLAGS field)

name: SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Makes target say its line from creature_text. If player, line from creature_text from this entry will be said. Doesn't trigger TEXT_OVER

help: [DEPRECATED] ?

name: SMART_ACTION_INVOKER_CAST
help: Behaves the same as ACTION_CAST

name: SMART_ACTION_CROSS_CAST
help: Behaves the same as ACTION_CAST

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_TIMED_ACTIONLIST
help: Source will start random script from smart_scripts with script_source_type == 9 (will override existing action list!)

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_RANGE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST
description: Call random timed action list between range {pram1} and {pram2}
help: Source will start random script from smart_scripts with script_source_type == 9 (will override existing action list!)

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MOVE

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: If 0, creature will stay idle in place

help: Creature starts moving randomly. If distance equals to zero, it will stay in place

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1
help: Adds flag to UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1
help: Removes flag from UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1

name: SMART_ACTION_INTERRUPT_SPELL
help: Interrupts current spell

name: SMART_ACTION_SEND_GO_CUSTOM_ANIM
help: Gameobjects sends SMSG_GAMEOBJECT_CUSTOM_ANIM packet

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_DYNAMIC_FLAG
help: Sets dynamic flags

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_DYNAMIC_FLAG
help: Adds dynamic flags

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_DYNAMIC_FLAG
help: Removes dynamic flags

name: SMART_ACTION_JUMP_TO_POS

parameters.name: Relative
parameters.description: If true, creature will jump to self position moved by offset given in target coords

parameters.name: Point ID
parameters.description: Point id sent to movementinform (default 1004)

description: Jump to {target_position} with speed XY {pram1} and speed Z {pram2}, point {pram4value:choose(0):1004|{pram4}}
help: Source jumps to position, MOVEMENT_INFORM with type EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE will be called [CATA only]

name: SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU

parameters.name: Menu Id
parameters.description: From gossip_menu

parameters.name: Text Id
parameters.description: From npc_text

description: Send gossip ID {pram1} with text {pram2} to {target}
help: [DEPRECATED] Sends gossip menu. You should simply use `gossip_`menu` and `conditions` tables.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_RANDOM_HEALTH
description: Set HP to random value between {pram1value} - {pram2value}%
help: Sets health to random percentage value.

name: SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_LOOT_STATE
help: Sets gameobject loot state

name: SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_SOURCE
help: Sends target to source (source needs SmartAI script); this used to be SEND_STORED_TARGET_TO_TARGET

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_MANA
help: Sets mana

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_MIN_HEALTH
description: Set minimum HP to {pram1value} (when damaged by another creature)
help: Sets creature minimum health.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_RESOURCE

parameters.name: Maximum value
parameters.description: Use only with parameter "Set Maximum value"

description: Set power type {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| with maximum set to {pram4}} to {pram3}
help: Sets creature resource

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_HEIGHT
help: Makes unit fly to given Z position.

name: SMART_ACTION_ENERGIZE
description: {pram1value:choose(1|2|3|4):Increase power by {pram2}{pram3value:choose(0):|SET NEW VALUE TO 0!!}|Decrease power by {pram2}{pram3value:choose(0):|SET NEW VALUE TO 0!!}|Set power value to {pram3}{pram2value:choose(0):|SET INC VALUE TO 0!!}|Set max power value to {pram2}{pram2value:choose(0):|SET INC VALUE TO 0!!}}
help: Gives energy

name: SMART_ACTION_SEARCH_TARGET
description: Search for {pram1value:choose(0):alive creatures {pram2}|players with incomplete quest {pram5} (ignore if 0)} in range {pram3} yards and trigger timed event {timed4} {pram6value:choose(0):| (and store the target with ID {pram6})}
help: [DEPRECATED] WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS SHIT

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_FLAG
help: Adds gameobject flag (not replace!)

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_UP
help: [DEPRECATED] Use Move to position + TARGET_SELF + position as offset

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_SPECIAL_INVIS
help: Source receives special invisbility for target. E.g. only target (or whole group) can see source, etc.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_HOME_POSITION
help: Sets source's home position (position where it will move after evade)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_COMBAT_DISTANCE
help: Changes creature combat distance

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_EXTRA_FLAG
help: Adds extra flag to creature

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_EXTRA_FLAG

1.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_INSTANCE_BIND
1.description: creature kill bind instance with killer and killer's group

1024.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_EVADE
1024.description: creature won't enter UNIT_STATE_EVADE (only works for creatures with Smart Scripts)

1048576.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_ALL_DIMINISH
1048576.description: Creature is subject to all diminishing returns as player are

1073741824.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_360_DEGREE_BACK
1073741824.description: creatue cannot parry and backstab/shred can be used from anywhere

16384.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_WORLDEVENT
16384.description: custom flag for world event creatures (left room for merging)

16777216.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_LOS_AA
16777216.description: Creature uses auto attack with los

2048.name: CREATURE_FLAG_DO_NOT_REMOVE_SPELLCLICK_ON_FULL_SEATS
2048.description: creature won't remove NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK when has all seats full

2097152.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_OOC_HP
2097152.description: Creature can use SMART_EVENT_HEALT_PCT while out of combat

256.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_TAUNT
256.description: creature is immune to taunt auras and effect attack me

268435456.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_DUNGEON_BOSS
268435456.description: creature is a dungeon boss (SET DYNAMICALLY, DO NOT ADD IN DB)

4194304.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_ALL_CAN_LOOT
4194304.description: Creature is allowed to loot by all players

512.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_PLAYER
512.description: creature will ignore player (works only with UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC)

524288.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_TAUNT_DIMINISH
524288.description: Taunt is a subject to diminishing returns on this creautre

536870912.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_270_DEGREE_BACK
536870912.description: creatue has larger back degree making the parry range smaller and allowing to use backstab/shred

8192.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_DEATH
8192.description: creature will not die (1 hp, only works with Smart Scripts)

8388608.name: CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_SEAT_CONTROL
8388608.description: Allows you to control vehicle on seat other than 1

help: Removes extra flag from creature

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_START_PATH

parameters.name: Path ID
parameters.description: ID from waypoint_data

parameters.name: Move time
parameters.description: Core scales speed to given time

parameters.name: Use new waypoints
parameters.description: New waypoints are from waypoint_creature_template_data

description: Start path #{pram1}, {pram2value:choose(0):do not repeat|repeat}{pram4value:choose(0):|, reversed}{pram3value:choose(0):| move in {pram3} ms}
help: Creature starts waypoint path. Path is taken from tables waypoint_creature_template_data (prefered) or waypoint_data. Uses smooth movement (post cata).

name: SMART_ACTION_CLEAR_DATA
description: Clear data set by event SetData
help: All datas from EVENT_DATA_SET are stored in script, this action will clear it (change to 0)

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FALL

parameters.name: Point ID
parameters.description: Point id sent to movementinform

help: Source will start falling. After falling will call MOVEMENT_INFORM with type EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_KNOCKBACK_TO

parameters.name: Point ID
parameters.description: Point id sent to movementinform

description: Move knockback to {target_position} with speed XY {pram1} and speed Z {pram2}, point {pram3}
help: Knockback unit to target. After movement will call MOVEMENT_INFORM with type EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_LAND

parameters.name: Point ID
parameters.description: Point id sent to movementinform

help: Creature lands at given target position. After landing will call MOVEMENT_INFORM with type EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE

name: SMART_ACTION_EXIT_VEHICLE
help: Source leaves its vehicle

name: SMART_ACTION_TARGET_ENTER_VEHICLE

parameters.name: Seat id
parameters.description: Seat id to enter, if occupied, current passenger will be ejected

help: Source enters target vehicle

name: SMART_ACTION_GAMEOBJECT_SET_STATE

parameters.name: Gameobject State
parameters.description: New gameobject state

0.name: GO_STATE_ACTIVE
0.description: Show in world as used and not reset (closed door open)

1.name: GO_STATE_READY
1.description: Show in world as ready (closed door close)

2.name: GO_STATE_ACTIVE_ALTERNATIVE
2.description: Show in world as used in alt way and not reset (closed door open by cannon fire)

help: Sets gameobject state

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CONTROLLED
help: Sets controlled

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_UNIT_STATE

1073741824.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_LOS
1073741824.description: Force allow while not in LOS

268435456.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING
268435456.description: do not use pathfinding in any MovementGenerator

524544.name: UNIT_STATE_UNATTACKABLE
524544.description: for real move using movegen check and stop (except unstoppable flight)

536870912.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_UNATTACKABLE
536870912.description: Force allow attack target with flag: UNIT_STATE_UNATTACKABLE

64.name: UNIT_STATE_PASSIVE_LOS
64.description: Allows creatures with passive react state to launch MoveInLineOfSight

8192.name: UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED
8192.description: area auras do not affect other players

help: Adds unit state

name: SMART_ACTION_CLEAR_UNIT_STATE

1073741824.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_LOS
1073741824.description: Force allow while not in LOS

268435456.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING
268435456.description: do not use pathfinding in any MovementGenerator

524544.name: UNIT_STATE_UNATTACKABLE
524544.description: for real move using movegen check and stop (except unstoppable flight)

536870912.name: UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_UNATTACKABLE
536870912.description: Force allow attack target with flag: UNIT_STATE_UNATTACKABLE

64.name: UNIT_STATE_PASSIVE_LOS
64.description: Allows creatures with passive react state to launch MoveInLineOfSight

8192.name: UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED
8192.description: area auras do not affect other players

help: Removes unit state

name: SMART_ACTION_SEND_PLAY_SPELL_VISUAL_KIT

parameters.name: Param
parameters.description: Unknown parameter

help: Source sends packet SMSG_PLAY_SPELL_VISUAL_KIT

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CORPSE_DELAY

parameters.name: Time
parameters.description: In seconds

help: Sets time after which creature corpse will disappear. Must be called before death

name: SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_STOP
help: Unit::AttackStop(). If you do not what to use, use ACTION_COMBAT_STOP

name: SMART_ACTION_COMBAT_STOP
help: Stops combat

name: SMART_ACTION_DELETE_THREAT_LIST
help: Removes all unit from threatlists. Be careful with this.

name: SMART_ACTION_CLEAR_MOTION_MASTER

parameters.name: With reset
parameters.description: Deep core stuff, default to true, change if you know what you are doing

0.name: Clear motion master
0.description: Will remove all movement generators but creature default (from creature table) and reset default movement generator

1.name: Movement expire
1.description: Similar to above, but will only remove top-most movement generator (unless it is creature default generator) and will not reset deafult one

description: {pram2value:choose(0):Clear motion master|Delete latest movement generator}{pram1value:choose(0): (without reset)|}
help: Removes creature movement generators. Depending on Mode parameter, either all movement generators but creature's deafult or only latest one. This doesn't mean creature will stop - if default movement is random or waypoint, npc will continue default movement.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_VEHICLE_SPELL

parameters.name: Slot
parameters.description: From 0

description: {pram2value:choose(0):Remove #{pram1} spell from action bar|Set #{pram1} spell on action bar to {pram2}}
help: Sets spell on vehicle bar

name: SMART_ACTION_STOP_MOVING
help: Stop moving

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_MOVEMENT_FLAG

1024.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_ROOT
1024.description: Must not be set along with MOVEMENTFLAG_MASK_MOVING

16777216.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FLYING
16777216.description: unit is actually flying. pretty sure this is only used for players. creatures use disable_gravity

2048.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING
2048.description: damage dealt on that type of falling

512.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_DISABLE_GRAVITY
512.description: Former MOVEMENTFLAG_LEVITATING. This is used when walking is not possible.

67108864.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_WATERWALKING
67108864.description: prevent unit from falling through water

8388608.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_CAN_FLY
8388608.description: Appears when unit can fly AND also walk

help: Adds movement flag

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_MOVEMENT_FLAG

1024.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_ROOT
1024.description: Must not be set along with MOVEMENTFLAG_MASK_MOVING

16777216.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FLYING
16777216.description: unit is actually flying. pretty sure this is only used for players. creatures use disable_gravity

2048.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING
2048.description: damage dealt on that type of falling

512.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_DISABLE_GRAVITY
512.description: Former MOVEMENTFLAG_LEVITATING. This is used when walking is not possible.

67108864.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_WATERWALKING
67108864.description: prevent unit from falling through water

8388608.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_CAN_FLY
8388608.description: Appears when unit can fly AND also walk

help: Removes movement flag

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_MOVEMENT_FLAG

1024.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_ROOT
1024.description: Must not be set along with MOVEMENTFLAG_MASK_MOVING

16777216.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FLYING
16777216.description: unit is actually flying. pretty sure this is only used for players. creatures use disable_gravity

2048.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING
2048.description: damage dealt on that type of falling

512.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_DISABLE_GRAVITY
512.description: Former MOVEMENTFLAG_LEVITATING. This is used when walking is not possible.

67108864.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_WATERWALKING
67108864.description: prevent unit from falling through water

8388608.name: MOVEMENTFLAG_CAN_FLY
8388608.description: Appears when unit can fly AND also walk

help: Sets movement flags

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_EXTRA_MOVEMENT_FLAG
help: Adds extra movement flag

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_EXTRA_MOVEMENT_FLAG
help: Removes extra movement flag

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_EXTRA_MOVEMENT_FLAG
help: Sets extra movement flags

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_SPEED
help: Set source movement speed

name: SMART_ACTION_CHANGE_SEAT
help: Source changes seat (if on vehicle)

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_HOME
description: {pram1value:choose(0|1|2):Run to home|Walk to home|Teleport to home
help: Source moves its home. Will call MOVEMENT_INFORM with type HOME_MOTION_TYPE

name: SMART_ACTION_REPEAT
help: Calls SMART_EVENT_REPEATED event N times.

name: SMART_ACTION_REPEAT_RANDOM

parameters.name: Draw every time
parameters.description: If true, function ID will be randomized every time, if false one random id will be called n times

help: Calls SMART_EVENT_REPEATED with id in range, N times.

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CAN_MOVE_HOME

parameters.name: On/off
parameters.description: If true, creature will move home on evade (default)

description: {pram1value:choose(0):Disable moving home on evade|Allow moving to home on evade
help: When set to false, script creature will not move home after evade

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_THREAT
help: Source adds threat to target

name: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_ONE_SHOT_ANIM_KIT

parameters.name: Anim kit
parameters.description: Taken from sniffs

help: Sends SMSG_PLAY_ONE_SHOT_ANIM_KIT packet

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ANIM_KIT

parameters.name: Anim kit
parameters.description: Taken from sniffs

help: Sends SMSG_SET_AI_ANIM_KIT

name: SMART_ACTION_CLEAR_STORED_TARGET
help: Removes stored targets from list with given id

name: SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_POSITION
help: Stores target position at given ID.

name: SMART_ACTION_CLEAR_STORED_POSITION
help: Removes stored position with given ID

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_DATA

parameters.name: Is special data
parameters.description: If true, the value will be set to variable @data of @source or @target

help: The same as SET_DATA, but firstly takes target current data and adds to it

name: SMART_ACTION_SUB_DATA

parameters.name: Is special data
parameters.description: If true, the value will be set to variable @data of @source or @target

help: The same as SET_DATA, but firstly takes target current data and subtracts from it

name: SMART_ACTION_MUL_DATA

parameters.name: Is special data
parameters.description: If true, the value will be set to variable @data of @source or @target

help: The same as SET_DATA, but firstly takes target current data and multiplies it

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_LEVEL

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: Ignored when UseTargetsLevel is true

help: Sets creature level

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE_GROUP

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: creature_summon_groups.groupId

help: Summons creature group from creature_summon_groups

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ALL_TIMED_EVENTS
help: Removes all timed events

name: SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_TEMPSUMMON_TIMER
help: Overrides temp summon timer

name: SMART_ACTION_SCRIPT_FOREACH_TARGET
help: Runs loop (invokes event SMART_EVENT_FOREACH_TARGET_LOOP for each target from targetlist

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CAN_CLEAR_AURAS_ON_EVADE
help: By default, all SAI creatures clear all auras on evade, use this action to change it

name: SMART_ACTION_TALK

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Group id from table creature_text. Random text will be said if multiple rows with the same group

parameters.name: Player target is talker
parameters.description: If true, player from target will say the dialogue

help: Makes creature or player talk a text from table creature_text

name: SMART_ACTION_DISABLE_GRAVITY

parameters.name: Disable
parameters.description: If true, gravity will be disabled

parameters.name: Packet only
parameters.description: If true, only packet will be sent. Default to false

help: Disables gravity for unit

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_AGGRO_RANGE

parameters.name: Aggro range
parameters.description: If 0, reset aggro range to default range

parameters.name: Threat distance
parameters.description: If 0, reset threat distance to default

help: Sets aggro range and threat distance
description: Set {pram1value:choose(0):default |}aggro range{pram1value:choose(0):| {pram1} yd} and {pram2value:choose(0):default |}threat distance {pram2value:choose(0):|{pram2} yd}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CALL_ASSIST_RANGE

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: If 0, reset call assist range to default

help: Sets distance within npc will be called to help unit if attacked
description: {pram1value:choose(0):Reset call assist range|Set call assist range to {pram1} yd}

name: SMART_ACTION_PATROLLING_PAUSE
help: Pauses npc waypoints set in creature.path_id for time

name: SMART_ACTION_DO_ACTION
help: Calls creature's AI DoAction method

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_GO_FLAG
help: Removes gameobject flag

name: SMART_ACTION_DEBUG_MESSAGE
help: Prints message from comment on all GMs account chats. Helpful during scripting, do not push to the repo tho.

name: SMART_ACTION_WAIT
help: Delays before next action call (use it within one event, it makese sense only in such case)

name: SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_SPELL_CAST_RESULT
help: Overrides spell cast result. Only usable in event EVENT_SPELL_ON_CHECK_CAST_RESULT

name: SMART_ACTION_PREVENT_HIT_AURA
help: Prevents default spell action

name: SMART_ACTION_PREVENT_HIT_DAMAGE
help: Prevents default spell action

name: SMART_ACTION_PREVENT_HIT_DEFAULT_EFFECT
help: Prevents default spell action
description: Prevent hit default effect with index {pram1}

name: SMART_ACTION_PREVENT_HIT_EFFECT
help: Prevents default spell action

name: SMART_ACTION_PREVENT_HIT_HEAL
help: Prevents default spell action

name: SMART_ACTION_SPELL_REMOVE_OBJECT
name_readable: Remove object from spell target list
help: When called in event OBJECT_AREA_TARGET_SELECT_SINGLE or OBJECT_TARGET_SELECT, will remove current unit (invoker) from target list
description: Remove invoker from spell target list

name: SMART_ACTION_SPELL_ADD_OBJECT
name_readable: Add object to spell target list
help: When called from SPELL_OBJECT_AREA_TARGET_SELECT, will add targets to spell target list

name: SMART_ACTION_SPELL_SET_DEST
help: When called from event SPELL_DESTINATION_TARGET_SELECT, will set spell destination to target position

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_SCALE
help: Sets object relative size (scale)

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_CHECK_RESULT
help: If set to false, aura will be removed

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_DISPEL_REMOVED_CHARGES
help: Sets amount of removed charges due to dispel

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_EFFECT_AMOUNT
help: Sets aura effect amount (what is that?)

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_CAN_BE_RECALCULATED
help: what is that?

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_IS_PERIODIC
help: Sets whether aura is periodic or not
description: {pram1value:choose(0):Set aura to non-periodic|Set aura to periodic}

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_AMPLITUDE
help: Sets how often aura will call periodic event

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_PREVENT_DEFAULT_ACTION
help: Prevents aura default action

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_REMOVE
help: Remoevs aura in specified mode

1.name: REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT
1.description: scripted remove, remove by stack with aura with different ids and sc aura remove

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_OVERRIDE_DURATION
help: Override duration

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_DURATION_TO_MAX_DURATION
help: Sets duration to max duration

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_OVERRIDE_MAX_DURATION
help: Overrides max aura duration

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_STACK_AMOUNT
help: Sets aura stacks amount

name: SMART_ACTION_AURA_SET_VEHICLE_EXIT_POSITION
help: Sets vehicle exit position

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_SPELL_TO_QUEUE
description: Add spell {pram1} to queue, cast on {pram2}

3.name: random target from threatlist but tank
3.description: same as AUTOCAST_RANDOM but without tank

6.name: second highest aggro target
6.description: cast on target in second place in threatlist

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_ALONG_CHAIN
help: Makes creature move using sniff data from table script_spline_chain_meta

parameters.name: Chain Id
parameters.description: script_spline_chain_meta.chainId

parameters.name: Point ID
parameters.description: After finishing Movement inform with this ID will be called

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_BYTES2
help: Adds, removes or set unit field bytes 2

name: SMART_ACTION_CANCEL_ALL_WAIT
help: Cancels all delayed actions (with WAIT action)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_STANDSTATE
help: Sets unit stand state (sit/sleep/dead/kneel)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CHANNEL_OBJECT
help: Sets object's channel object (unit will keep facing towards this object)

name: SMART_ACTION_LOAD_ADDON_ON_EVADE
name_readable: Can load addon data on evade
help: You can set whether creature should reload data from creature_(template_)addon or not on evade. By default it loads the data.
description: {pram1value:choose(0):Disable loading creature addon data on evade|Enable loading creature addon data on evade}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CAN_EVADE
help: You can set whether creature can evade
description: {pram1value:choose(0):Do not allow entering evade|Allow entering evade}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_BOSS_ID
help: If set, npc will report state (died, in progress, none) to instance script with this id. It will automatically save boss state

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAGS2
help: You can set, remove or add unit flags 2 here
